views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9.2 and till 12.1.2.

PlayMusicOnRecord is a Handy Tweak that Allows you to Record a Video and Play Music and Audio Together on System Wide!

So, Let Disable the Music and Audio from stopping when recording Videos!

See Screenshot below.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak!

Configure options from Settings.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.2 - Added support for arm64e/A12. Only Tested on iOS 10-12. Older Versions Should Avoid on updating (thanks Jonas for testing). Version 1.0.1
- As Requested, Added the option to Play the Music while Screen Recording (to Record Audio Enable the Microphone on the Screen Record icon.).
- Extended the Frameworks.
